creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: hexagonal basket with tapered, round mouth; squarish handle; patterned weaving along top of handle; swirling, elegant supports and decorations along handle; ornate, star-shaped close weaving pattern; carving on supports; large copper lined bamboo cylinder with grate at top
signed: incsised bottom: 竹雲斎造之 {Chikuunsai kore o tsukuru} (Chikuunsai made this)
title: Chinese-Style Flower Basket
